feed.title: WeTTY Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for WeTTY: v2.4.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Rather then -> Rather than by @shimile in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/399
  • Fix download bug by @just-luk in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/401
  • Bump minimist from 1.2.5 to 1.2.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/388
  • Bump semver-regex from 3.1.3 to 3.1.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/402
  • Bump jsdom from 15.2.1 to 16.5.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/403
  • escape special chars in username: - . \ @ by @revarcline in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/406
  • Bump cirrus-actions/rebase from 1.2 to 1.7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/412
  • Bump pascalgn/npm-publish-action from 1.3.8 to 1.3.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/411
  • Bump actions/checkout from 2 to 3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/410
  • Bump actions/stale from 3 to 5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/409
  • Bump docker/login-action from 1 to 2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/408

New Contributors

  • @shimile made their first contribution in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/399
  • @just-luk made their first contribution in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/401
  • @revarcline made their first contribution in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/406

Full Changelog: https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/compare/v2.4.0...v2.4.2

entry.title: New release for WeTTY: v2.6.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update development flow to be less confusing by @butlerx in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/441
  • Update downloading-files.md by @i81b4u in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/456
  • Bump http-cache-semantics from 4.1.0 to 4.1.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/461
  • Bump json5 from 2.2.1 to 2.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/455
  • Bump actions/stale from 6 to 7 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/453
  • Bump docker/build-push-action from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/460
  • Bump cirrus-actions/rebase from 1.7 to 1.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/452
  • Bump engine.io from 6.2.0 to 6.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/450
  • Bump loader-utils from 3.2.0 to 3.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/449
  • Bump vm2 from 3.9.11 to 3.9.19 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/468
  • Bump actions/stale from 7 to 8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/469
  • allow different port from ssh_config by @gpancot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/457
  • Add allowIframe environment variable for Docker by @jk-ethz in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/446

New Contributors

  • @i81b4u made their first contribution in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/456
  • @gpancot made their first contribution in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/457
  • @jk-ethz made their first contribution in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/446

Full Changelog: https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/compare/v2.5.0...v2.6.0

entry.title: New release for WeTTY: v2.7.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • [NPM] Bump lint-staged from 10.5.4 to 13.2.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/475
  • [NPM] Bump yargs and @types/yargs by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/473
  • Fix typo in atoz.md by @tony2guo in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/490
  • fix image support by @jerch in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/489
  • [NPM] Bump word-wrap from 1.2.3 to 1.2.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/487
  • [NPM] Bump semver from 5.7.1 to 5.7.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/485
  • [GH action] Bump actions/checkout from 3 to 4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/495
  • fix docker build by adding node-gyp by @kleinhammer in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/486
  • Allow specifying/retaining names of downloaded files. by @mathiasmagnusson in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/488

New Contributors

  • @tony2guo made their first contribution in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/490
  • @kleinhammer made their first contribution in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/486
  • @mathiasmagnusson made their first contribution in https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/pull/488

Full Changelog: https://github.com/butlerx/wetty/compare/v2.6.0...v2.7.0
